label: Ubuntu CD Image Automatic Signing Key (2012) <cdimage@ubuntu.com>

refs.comment: Instructions for verifying Ubuntu downloads accompanied by full length fingerprint shown listed alongside 0x46181433FBB75451
Instructions for verifying Ubuntu downloads posted under Ubuntu Community Hub system account bearing Discourse Trust Level 4 (Leader)
First mention of fingerprint by GitHub user @pmahnke in association with the Ubuntu project
Attestation by Ubuntu Security Team and AppArmor maintainer Steve Beattie regarding ACLs for editing access
Referenced archive and import GPG keys by Steve Beattie, Ubuntu Security Team
